reviewText: This game is even casual-er(is casual-er even a word?) than normal casual games. If you want to relax and play an easy game that makes you feel like you don't suck at playing games then buy this.\n\nALSO I cannot switch from full-screen to window mode. For a game this casual i would of thought that it can be played in window mode. bah!!!

reviewText:
AINSLIEâ€™S LITTLE PEARLS

California is a cute little game that requires a small amount of strategy to complete each task and the occasional bought of patience to wait out the reload of the food bushes.  This game is a quick play that allows you to achieve tasks quickly and move through the levels with ease.  The cute inhabitants of this small world bring brightness, colour and fun to the game and even cheer you on with each achievement.  I recommend this little pearl of a game for a short chill out/mental break  session from the real world, a chance to escape reality and be the hero of California.
